import React ,{useEffect}from 'react' import { useCountriesContext } from '../ContextCountries/context' import { Wrapper, Container, InputsContainer, SearchBox, SearchInput, FilterSelect, FilterOption, SearchIcon, CardsContainer, CountryCard, Image, CountryTitle, CountryInfo, Info,InfoSpan } from '../HomePage/style' import {AiOutlineSearch} from 'react-icons/ai' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' function HomePage(props) { const {countries,setCountries} = useCountriesContext() useEffect(() => { fetch('https://restcountries.com/v3.1/all') .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => setCountries(data)) }, [setCountries]) if(!countries){ return
loading
} return ( Filter by Region Africa Americas Asia Europa Oceania {countries.map((item,index) =>( {item.name.common} Population: {item.population.toLocaleString('pt-br')} Region: {item.region} Capital: {item.capital ? item.capital : 'No capital'} ))} ) } export default HomePage
